programs.title: The Tensor Program
programs.description: A competitive non-profit accelerator program designed to identify and support the most promising founders across LATAM. We believe in merit-based selection and empowering exceptional talent.

overview.title: Program Overview
overview.content: Tensor is designed to empower exceptional founders across LATAM. We provide mentorship, resources, and connections to help you build transformative companies. Our program focuses on merit-based selection and supporting visionary entrepreneurs.

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer
items: Mentorship from experienced founders and industry leaders
Access to our network of investors and partners
Strategic guidance and business development support

steps.title: Apply
steps.description: Submit your application with your startup idea and demonstrate product-market fit potential.

steps.title: Review
steps.description: Our team reviews applications and selects the most promising founders.

steps.title: Join
steps.description: Selected teams receive comprehensive support and access to our startup ecosystem.

eligibility.title: Who Should Apply
items: Teams committed to building scalable companies
Entrepreneurs focused on creating impact in LATAM
Founders seeking mentorship and strategic guidance

stages.title: Application & Selection
stages.description: We identify the most promising founders through a rigorous, merit-based selection process.

stages.title: Incubation
stages.description: Selected founders work closely with mentors to refine their ideas and build their MVP.

stages.title: Acceleration
stages.description: Focus on growth, user acquisition, and preparing for investment.

stages.title: Launch & Funding
stages.description: Launch your startup and connect with our network of investors.

programs.missionPhilosophyText: We believe that talent is evenly distributed, but opportunity is not. Tensor exists to bridge that gap by providing the resources, mentorship, and network that exceptional founders need to succeed.
